name: Pong Combat
description:
Make for Black And White game jam 2022.

I tried to add some elements to classic Ping Pong games. To create a gameplay with faster pace and more potential to expand in the future.

Control:

  • Left Arrow and Right Arrow: move
  • Up Arrow: use your (only) skill

Considering this is a prototype, I would really appriciate if you share what you think.
